contextMenuItemSelectionLogger.description: Title of context menu item that logs the selected text when clicked.

contextMenuItemRemoveMe.description: Title of context menu item that removes itself when clicked.

contextMenuItemGreenify.description: Title of context menu item that adds a green border when clicked.

contextMenuItemBluify.description: Title of context menu item that adds a green border when clicked.

contextMenuItemCheckMe.description: Title of context menu item when the item is checked.

contextMenuItemUncheckMe.description: Title of context menu item when the item is unchecked.

contextMenuItemOpenSidebar.description: Title of context menu item that opens a sidebar.
